sentences.sContent: Real men embrace the stiffness in our muscles as we rise from bed each morning and the gradual loss of our sexual drive.
sentences.sContent_eng: Real men embrace the stiffness in our muscles as we rise from bed each morning and the gradual loss of our sexual drive.
sentences.sCn: 正像我们每天早晨从床上起来，我们的性欲冲动逐渐消失一样，真正的男人应欣然接受僵硬的肌肉。

sentences.sContent: Chronic mild fever, emaciation, loss of appetite, gait stiffness, some cough, have arthritis. Course of 1 month or so, the outcome of death.
sentences.sContent_eng: Chronic mild fever, emaciation, loss of appetite, gait stiffness, some cough, have arthritis. Course of 1 month or so, the outcome of death.
sentences.sCn: 慢性型轻度发热，消瘦，食欲不振，步态僵硬，有的咳嗽，有的出现关节炎。病程1月左右，转归死亡。

sentences.sContent: The result is to reduce stiffness, which will prevent arthritis or improve it if you already have the condition. Maintaining many of the asanas encourages strength and endurance.
sentences.sContent_eng: The result is to reduce stiffness, which will prevent arthritis or improve it if you already have the condition. Maintaining many of the asanas encourages strength and endurance.
sentences.sCn: 其结果是减少僵硬，这将防止关节炎或改进，如果你已经有了这个条件。体式保持了许多鼓励的力量和耐力。

phrases.pCn: n. 抗弯刚度；抗挠刚度
刚劲因数；劲度因子；倔强因数

words.tran: 呆板的；坚硬的；严厉的；拘谨的；拘谨的
